summary.span: 表示可包含其他可视元素的可滚动区域。

span.span: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使内容能够在小于其实际大小的区域中显示。A enables content to be displayed in a smaller area than its actual size. 如果 的内容不完全可见，则 将显示用户可用于移动可见内容区域的滚动条。When the content of the is not entirely visible, the displays scrollbars that the user can use to move the content areas that is visible. 包含 的所有内容的区域是范围。The area that includes all of the content of the is the extent. 内容的可见区域是视区。The visible area of the content is the viewport. 物理滚动用于按预设的物理增量（通常按以像素为单位声明的值）滚动内容。Physical scrolling is used to scroll content by a predetermined physical increment, typically by a value that is declared in pixels. 逻辑滚动用于滚动到逻辑树中的下一项。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next item in the logical tree. 如果需要物理滚动而不是逻辑滚动，请将宿主 元素包装在 中，并将其 属性设置为 "`false`"。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`. 物理滚动是大多数 元素的默认滚动行为。Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most elements. 如果 包含大量项，则滚动性能可能会受到影响。If your contains a large number of items, the scrolling performance may be affected. 在这种情况下，将 设置为 `true`。In this case, set to `true`. 这会使内容视图在拖动 时保持静态，并且仅在释放 时才会更新。This causes the content view to remain static while dragging the and to update only when the is released. 由于 元素的滚动条是在元素的默认样式中定义的，因此，如果将自定义样式应用到 ，将不再显示滚动条。Because the scroll bars for a element are defined in the default style of the element, scroll bars will no longer appear if you apply a custom style to a . 滚动条必须在自定义样式中定义，才能显示。Scroll bars must be defined in the custom style for them to appear. ## 自定义 ScrollViewer 控件Customizing the ScrollViewer Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 以使控件具有独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[ScrollViewer 样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ScrollViewer Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含某些文本和一个矩形的 。The following example creates a that contains some text and a rectangle. 滚动条仅在需要时才会出现。The scroll bars appear only when they are needed. 调整窗口大小时，滚动条将出现并消失。When you resize the window, the scroll bars appear and disappear. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的内容可以根据物理单元或逻辑单元进行滚动。Content in a can be scrolled in terms of physical units or logical units. 物理单元是与设备无关的像素。Physical units are device independent pixels. 逻辑单元用于在 中滚动项目。Logical units are used for scrolling items within an . 的默认行为是使用物理单元滚动其内容。The default behavior of the is to use physical units to scroll its content. 但是，在将 设置为 `true`的情况下，内容可以使用逻辑单元进行滚动。However, in cases where the is set to `true`, the content could use logical units to scroll. 例如，、以及从 继承的其他控件使用逻辑单元进行滚动。For example, , , and other controls that inherit from use logical units to scroll. 如果 `true`，则 、、和 属性的值都是项的数目，而不是物理单元。If is `true`, the values of the , , , and properties are number of items, instead of physical units. 如果需要物理滚动而不是逻辑滚动，请将宿主 元素包装在 中，并将其 属性设置为 "`false`"。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`. 物理滚动是大多数 元素的默认滚动行为。Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most elements. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用代码设置 属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. span.span: Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 识别以下键盘输入：The following keyboard input is recognized: - 向左键：将内容向左滚动一行。The LEFT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the left. - 向右箭头键：将内容向右滚动一行。The RIGHT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the right. - 向上键：将内容向上滚动一行。The UP ARROW key: Scrolls content upward by one line. - 向下箭头键：将内容向下滚动一行。The DOWN ARROW key: Scrolls content downward by one line. - PAGE UP：将内容滚动到当前页的顶部。PAGE UP: Scrolls content to the top of the current page. - PAGE DOWN：将内容滚动到当前页的底部。PAGE DOWN: Scrolls content to the bottom of the current page. - HOME：将内容滚动到首页的顶部。HOME: Scrolls content to the top of the first page. - END：将内容滚动到最后一页的底部。END: Scrolls content to the bottom of the last page.

summary.span: 获取或设置 在惯性运动时减慢的速率（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]/平方毫秒）。

span.span: The rate slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户使用触控滚动 时，用户将手指放在 上，将手指在屏幕上移动一小段距离，然后在移动手指时将其抬起。When a user scrolls the by using touch, the user puts a finger on the , moves the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then lifts the finger while it is moving. 这样做的结果是，在用户抬起手指后 将继续移动。The result of this is that the will continue to move after the user lifts the finger. 属性指定用户抬起手指后滚动减慢的速率。The property specifies the rate the scrolling slows after the user lifts the finger.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定 是水平滚动还是垂直滚动。The property specifies whether the scroll horizontally, vertically, or both. 当用户在支持 Windows Touch 的触摸设备上拖动控件上的手指时， 将滚动。The will scroll when a user drags a finger on the control on a touch device that supports Windows Touch. 可以直接在 上设置，也可以用作附加属性。 can be either set directly on a or used as an attached property. 如果控件在其 中包含 ，请使用 作为附加属性来指定 中的 的行为。When a control contains a in its , use as an attached property to specify the behavior of the in the . 使用 之外的 时，请直接在 上设置 。When you use a outside of a , set directly on the . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并向其中添加几个元素。The following example creates a and adds several elements to it. 在此示例中，当窗口的大小改变时，`textblock1` 的大小也会改变。In this example, when the size of the window changes, the size of `textblock1` also changes. 当 太小而无法显示所有内容时， 将变为可滚动。When the is too small to display all of the content, the becomes scrollable. 该示例将 设置为 ，以便用户可以使用手指水平和垂直滚动 。The example sets to so that the user can scroll the horizontally and vertically by using a finger. [!code-xaml[ScrollViewerPanning#PanningModeDirect](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollviewerpanning/CS/mainwindow.xaml#panningmodedirect)] 下面的示例创建一个 ，并使用 作为附加属性。The following example creates a and uses as an attached property. 默认情况下， 的 中的 的 为 。By default the in the of a has its to . 这样，当用户在垂直方向上移动手指之前，用户将突出显示文本。This is so that when the user moves a finger horizontally before moving it vertically, the user highlights text. 该示例将 设置为 以使用户无法使用手指选择文本。The example sets to so that the user cannot select text by using a finger. 请注意，将 设置为 " 也会阻止用户选择文本。Note that setting to also prevents the user from selecting text. 该示例将 属性设置为 ，因此不需要水平滚动。The example sets the property to , so horizontal scrolling is not necessary. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `null`，则此方法不会引发任何滚动行为。This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if is `null`. 逻辑滚动用于滚动到逻辑树中的下一个元素。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 这不同于物理滚动，后者按给定方向按定义的物理增量滚动内容。This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果需要物理滚动而不是逻辑滚动，请将宿主 元素包装在 中，并将其 属性设置为 "`false`"。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.
